titles.title: For the relief of Herman J. Koehler, III.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/18/1996--Introduced. Relieves a named individual of any disabilities imposed upon him pursuant to provisions that prohibit certain persons from shipping, transporting, possessing, or receiving firearms or ammunition in interstate or foreign commerce as a result of his conviction of a conspiracy to commit an offense against, or to defraud, the United States.
